Name: GothamResearch
Text: Criteo SA (NASDAQ: $CRTO): Why We Believe Criteo’s Undisclosed Practices are Illegal and Harmful to Advertisers https://t.co/B4QiRTGSLS

Name: GothamResearch
Text:
What is Criteo hiding?
And why is Criteo destroying evidence?
Criteo’s undisclosed acts of desperation 
show Apple’s ITP is a game changer

Name: GothamResearch
Text: Criteo & its cheerleaders say Apple ITP is merely a temporary setback, just as ad blocking and header bidding were in recent years. If true,

Name: GothamResearch
Text:
why do CRTO behaviors say otherwise?
Why is Criteo resorting to dangerous & (we believe) illegal behaviors, i.e. its usage of Super cookies?

Name: GothamResearch
Text:
(continued) HSTS super cookies as its Apple ITP workaround?

And why does Criteo attempt to cover its tracks, by destroying evidence?

Name: GothamResearch
Text: We believe Criteo destroyed information because its ITP workaround – HSTS super cookie – is used in violation of Section 5 of the FTC Act.

Name: GothamResearch
Text: We wrote to Apple last week, explaining why we believe Criteo's ITP workaround is both dangerous & illegal. Here is… https://t.co/ghl1tQuddY

Name: GothamResearch
Text: We've updated today's report to include Apple's response to Criteo's privacy abuses.
